mapper.select: select a.id as id, (select count(*) from live_c2c_message b where b.from_id = a.user_id and b.group_id = 1 and is_view = 0 ) as ykCount, a.user_id as userId, a.group_id as groupId, a.water_group_id as waterGroupId, c.user_nick_name as ykName, c.create_time as ykTime, CONCAT('yk-',a.user_id) as flag from user_relation as a left join user_info c on a.user_id = c.user_id and a.group_id = c.group_id where a.relation_user_id = #{0} and a.group_id = 1 order by ykTime desc
